title: The First Ever Radio Hour 7/26/21
itunes:title: The First Ever Radio Hour 7/26/21
description:
Jeremy Bolm plays DJ and brings a nostalgic playlist of late 90’s/2000’s emo
 
On this episode hear tracks from The Anniversary, Jimmy Eat World, The Get Up Kids, Rainer Maria, Mineral, Jets to Brazil, Hey Mercedes, Cursive, Piebald, Sunny Day Real Estate, and much more!

Subscribe to the PATREON and receive a brand new radio hour every Sunday! Thats two additional episodes a month AND you get them a day early!

Follow the show on Instagram and Twitter!
